title: Human Footstep Essential
description: A bunch of Humans Footsteps SFX
longDescription:
You'll find inside the pack the essentials sfx to do basic human footsteps.

There is a bunch of step of differents textures: Concrete, Grass, Gravel, Leaf, Pebble, Water, Wood

with multiple variation for each type of step: Running, Walking, Sneaking.

You can find some loop too if you are bored to implement the steps.
technicalDetails:
Here is the sound list of the pack:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Dia0ogdhziTuJbQyHdpHVuuSpgfyFDb_jtl-XSS6s6o/edit?usp=sharing

And here is the Demo of the pack:

https://youtu.be/g4d_EwAnapM

Features:

Footstep

  •  Concrete - Running, Walking, Sneaking : 22 wav files, 22 cue files.
  •  Grass - Sneaking : 5 wav files, 5 cue files.
  •  Gravel - Running, Walking, Sneaking : 23 wav files, 23 cue files.
  •  Leaf - Running, Walking, Sneaking : 39 wav files, 39 cue files.
  •  Pebble - Running, Walking, Sneaking : 21 wav files, 21 cue files.
  •  Water - Running, Walking, Sneaking : 19 wav files, 19 cue files.
  •  Wood - Running, Walking, Sneaking : 34 wav files, 34cue files.

Number of Audio Waves: 153

Number of Audio Cues:153

Sample rate / bit rate: 16Bit/44,100 Hz Stéréo

Some Sound FX loop

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
